<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.reference.GetAreaOfCoverCountries_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetAreaOfCoverCountries_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetAreaOfCoverCountries_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetAreaOfCoverCountries_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetAreaOfCoverCountries_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for area of cover country retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="AreaOfCoverCountriesRequest" nillable="true" type="tns:AreaOfCoverCountriesRequest"/> <xs:element name="AreaOfCoverCountriesResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:AreaOfCoverCountriesResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="AreaOfCoverCountriesRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for the countries included within a given area of cover</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AreaOfCover" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The area of cover code to retrieve countries for</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="QueryDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date/point of time which should be used to query for information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AreaOfCoverCountriesResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for the countries included within a given area of cover</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Countries" type="tns:ArrayOfCountries" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The countries which are included in the provided area of cover, expressed as a collection of ISO country codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidFrom" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date that the area of cover countries applies from</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date that the area of cover countries applies to, or null if the collection of country codes is current</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfCountries"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains an array of countries expressed as ISO country codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Country" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

name="CoverageLimits" type="tns:CoverageLimits" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfCoverageLimits" type="tns:ArrayOfCoverageLimits" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="LimitPeriod" type="tns:LimitPeriod" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="CoverageLimits"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encapsulates the coverage limits associated with a given benefit group expressed in both finanical and incidence units.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaBenefitGroupId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Benefit Group Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Period" type="tns:LimitPeriod" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The period to which the limit applies (e.g. Per Year, Per Lifetime, Per Condition)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FinancialLimit" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The maximum amount that can be claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="IncidencesLimit" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The maximum number of treatment incidences that can be claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentUnit" type="tns:TreatmentUnits" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unit of treatment measure (e.g. day, visit, procedure, course). Must contain a value if FinancialLimitPerUnit contains a value.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FinancialLimitPerUnit" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The maximum amount that can be claimed per unit. Must contain a value if TreatmentUnit contains a value.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidFrom" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the Limit is valid from.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the Limit is valid to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfCoverageLimits"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A collection of CoverageLimits.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CoverageLimits" type="tns:CoverageLimits" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A collection of CoverageLimits.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="LimitPeriod"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list periods which a limit may be imposed for</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PerYear"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Limit is applied annually</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PerLifeTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Limit applied to the life of the product</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PerCondition"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Limit linked to a specific benefit</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TreatmentUnits"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list periods which a limit may be imposed for</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Day"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Treatment measured in days</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Visit"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Treatment measured in visits</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Procedure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Treatment measured in procedures</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Course"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Treatment measured in courses</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common diagnosis type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfDiagnosis" type="tns:ArrayOfDiagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Diagnosis"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Standard" type="tns:DiagnosisStandard" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The standard of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfDiagnosis"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A collection of diagnosis.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A diagnosis type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="DiagnosisStandard"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of supported diagnosis standards .</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v9 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v10 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.reference.GetBenefit_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetBenefit_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.reference.GetBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonBenefit="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Benefit_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Benefit_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Benefit_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for Benefit retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="BenefitRequest" nillable="true" type="tns:BenefitRequest"/> <xs:element name="BenefitResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:BenefitResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="BenefitRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for a Benefit.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaProductId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The identifier of the product the Benefit belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaBenefitId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Benefit identifier associated with the Benefit to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The ISO code of the currency the SumInsured.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="QueryDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date for which the information should be returned for. <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the product (e.g. Active, Lapsed)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidFrom" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the product is valid from.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the product is valid to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalInformation" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Notes on the product</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AreaOfCover" type="commonArray:ArrayOfString"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The areas in which the cover applies (also known as the Product Pricing Zone).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SumInsured" type="tns:SumInsuredInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The overall financial limit(s) of the product cover expressed in the requested currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BenefitTypeIds" type="commonArray:ArrayOfString"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Id’s of type="commonArray:ArrayOfString"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Id’s of the Benefits that make up this Product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiagnosticCodes" type="commonDiagnosis:ArrayOfDiagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The diagnosis codes that make up this Product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfRelatedProductIds"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encapsulates a list of product identifiers</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RelatedProductID" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfSumInsuredInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encapulates a collection of SumInsuredInformation structures</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ArrayOfSumInsuredInformation" type="tns:SumInsuredInformation" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SumInsuredInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The overall financial limit(s) of the product cover.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SumInsured" type="xs:decimal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The overall financial limit of the product cover.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidFrom" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the SumInsured value is valid from.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the SumInsured value is valid to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Period" type="commonCoverageLimits:LimitPeriod" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The period to which the limit applies (e.g. Per Year, Per Lifetime, Per Condition).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.ProductStatus_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.ProductStatus_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.ProductStatus_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.ProductStatus_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.ProductStatus_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common ProductStatus enumerated type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ProductStatus" type="tns:ProductStatus" nillable="true"/> <xs:simpleType name="ProductStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of product status options</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. <xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the faults which may emanate from Bupa Systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="InternalFault" type="tns:InternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ExternalFault" type="tns:ExternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ServiceUnavailableFault" type="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="InternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the InternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured within the Bupa system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details regarding the internal fault</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RetryIndicator" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds an indicator which described whether the fault may be rectified by retrying</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ExternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to incorrect supply of data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details of why the external fault occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Code" type="tns:ExternalFaultCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a value which indicates the category of external fault generated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ServiceUnavailableFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to system being temporarily out of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Information" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds information which is associated with service downtime and restoration expectations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExternalFaultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of external fault codes which indicate general reasons as to why a fault has occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="InsufficientDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Insufficient data has been supplied to execute the request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="IncompatibleDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Incompatible data was supplied in one or more fields or data supplied was not compatible with existing data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GeneralValidationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general validation error occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestedDataNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested data was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AuthorizationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The connecting client could not be authorized</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OperationNotImplemented"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested operation has not been implemented and is not supported</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general error occured which could not be classified</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
